Articles.Content:
Hi!

I wont be surprised if this has been asked before, but I couldn't find anything on the topic.

 

Every now and then, when I go back to KSC, the menu buttons dissapear (the ones in the lower left of the screen). Also the game do not respond when I click the buildings, which means I have no option to enter the VAB or Tracking station.

Any fix for this?

Is it memory leak?
